contents.text: Thank you for calling Founders Fund, a San Francisco venture capital firm investing in smart people solving difficult problems.
If you are an entrepreneur seeking funding, press 1 to choose that menu.
To submit a new pitch deck, press 1 to choose that menu.
Please hold while we connect you to our investment team.

navigationGoals: I need to upload my startup’s pitch deck for initial funding consideration.
I’d like to submit my pitch deck for my veteran-focused career-transition startup.
Send my startup’s pitch deck to the investment team for seed financing evaluation
I’d like to submit my startup’s pitch deck.
I want to share my quantum computing startup proposal with your investment team.

contents.text: To follow up on an existing application, press 2 to choose that menu.
One moment please, connecting you to our partnerships manager.

navigationGoals: I want to check the status of my existing funding application.
I’m calling to follow up on my existing funding application.
Check the status of my existing seed funding application and due diligence progress
I want to get an update on my existing funding application.
I need to check the status of my existing funding application for my photonics research startup.

contents.text: For information about our firm, press 2 to choose that menu.
To hear our latest portfolio highlights, press 1 to choose that menu.
Please hold for recent success stories from our portfolio companies.

navigationGoals: I’d like to hear the latest success stories from your portfolio companies.
I want to hear recent portfolio success stories, especially around companies helping veterans.
Retrieve the latest performance metrics and case studies from their portfolio companies
I’d like to hear your recent portfolio success stories.
I’d like to hear your most recent deep-tech portfolio success stories.

contents.text: To speak with our general inquiries desk, press 2 to choose that menu.
Please hold while we transfer you to a representative.

navigationGoals: I need to speak with someone about general information and questions regarding your firm.
I need to speak with a representative about general inquiries and veteran entrepreneurship programs.
Speak with a representative about the firm’s investment criteria and general office operations
I need to speak with a representative for general inquiries.
I have questions about internship opportunities for physics students at your firm.
